unnormalised: CBSE class 10 results declared! Pass percentage higher than last year's, says official sources. Expect celebratory samosas at every corner. Students can check their scores online using their roll no. and school code. 98% passed - guess all that late-night studying *actually* paid off.
normalised: C-B-S-E class ten results declared! Pass percentage higher than last year's, says official sources. Expect celebratory samosas at every corner. Students can check their scores online using their roll number and school code. ninety eight percent passed - guess all that late-night studying actually paid off.

unnormalised: Rumours are rife that some coaching centres are already planning victory parades, because obviously, they are the *only* reason anyone passes these exams. Congrats to all the students, especially those who managed to keep their sanity during the whole ordeal. Remember, marks aren't everything - unless your parents think otherwise, in which case, good luck!
normalised: Rumours are rife that some coaching centres are already planning victory parades, because obviously, they are the only reason anyone passes these exams. Congrats to all the students, especially those who managed to keep their sanity during the whole ordeal. Remember, marks aren't everything - unless your parents think otherwise, in which case, good luck!

unnormalised: Speaking of parents, brace yourselves for the "Sharma ji ka beta" comparisons. If you scored less than 99%, you're basically a failure in their eyes. But hey, at least you tried! And if you topped the exam? Well, get ready for a lifetime of unrealistic expectations.
normalised: Speaking of parents, brace yourselves for the "Sharma ji ka beta" comparisons. If you scored less than ninety nine percent, you're basically a failure in their eyes. But hey, at least you tried! And if you topped the exam? Well, get ready for a lifetime of unrealistic expectations.

unnormalised: Those who didn’t clear the exam will have a supplementary exam in Aug. The exam date will be declared on 20/07/2024. Don’t worry, you have another chance to prove to Sharma ji that you’re not *completely* hopeless. Best of luck!
normalised: Those who didn’t clear the exam will have a supplementary exam in August. The exam date will be declared on twentieth July two thousand and twenty four. Don’t worry, you have another chance to prove to Sharma ji that you’re not completely hopeless. Best of luck!
